name: Shifter (Urist_McDorf, ramit110)
description:
In this top-down shooter you'll alternate between being able to aim and being able to move, while the other part is handled by AI.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse for aiming
  • Hold LMB to start aiming down the sights for extra accuracy, release to shoot

Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was "Out of Control".

  • Urist McDorf - code, art
  • Ramit110 - code
